images.description: DSS image of the star listed as IC 462, and of PGC 2365343, the galaxy that may have led Kobold to think the star a nebulous object; also shown is the western edge of NGC 2340

DSS image of region near the star (and companion galaxy) listed as IC 462, also showing lenticular galaxies IC 458, 459, 460, 461 and 465, spiral galaxy IC 463, elliptical galaxy IC 464, and elliptical galaxy NGC 2340
